tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE stock_prices (
    stock_id INT,
    date DATE,
    open_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    high_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    low_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    close_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    volume INT
);

CREATE TABLE stocks (
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    open_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    close_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    high_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    low_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    volume INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE stock_prices (
    stock_id INT,
    date DATE,
    open_price FLOAT,
    close_price FLOAT,
    high_price FLOAT,
    low_price FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE neural_network_data (
    data_id INT,
    stock_id INT,
    date DATE,
    input_data JSON,
    output_data JSON
);

CREATE TABLE historical_stock_prices (
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(10),
    date DATE,
    open_price DECIMAL,
    close_price DECIMAL,
    volume INT
);

CREATE TABLE stock_prices (
    price_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol_id INT REFERENCES stock_symbols(symbol_id),
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    open_price DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    close_price DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    high_price DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    low_price DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    volume INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE stock_indicators (
    indicator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol_id INT REFERENCES stock_symbols(symbol_id),
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    indicator_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    value DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE neural_networks (
    network_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    network_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    layers INT NOT NULL,
    neurons_per_layer INT NOT NULL,
    learning_rate DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE training_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol_id INT REFERENCES stock_symbols(symbol_id),
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    indicator_value DECIMAL NOT NULL
);
